author: lukaszrozmej
content: should we have shanghai dedicated channel?

author: timbeiko
content: We discussed that on the last ACD and the rough consensus was that we should probably have one when ACD calls start again. In the meantime, we can use this channel, but given we're pausing the calls for people to take some time to rest, we didn't want to create another high-volume one for people to monitor.

author: sky.cactus
content: I'm not really convinced there was "rough consensus".  I think only you and I commented on it and everyone else was silent, and you and I disagreed but Tim trumps Micah.
